pull.title: utils: Convert fs::filesystem_error messages from local multibyte to utf-8 on Windows

events.message: utils: Convert fs error messages from multibyte to utf-8

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13878 (utils: Add fstream wrapper to allow to pass unicode filename on Windows by ken2812221)
* #13787 (Test for Windows encoding issue by ken2812221)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

tACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14192/commits/e2213689328f8ba42af1d32d12c7b78a71f1ddc7.

![14192_dialog](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/197660/45504743-ff378a80-b78a-11e8-9f26-273e7eda0509.png)

Note that the directory shown in the dialog does exist but that's a separate problem that is dealt with by #13787.
